snippet: THE COMMON COUNCIL.--This Body held a special meeting on Tuesday evening, to take into consideration two pressing subjects. First, the Long Island Railroad case, and secondly, an invitation received from the Board of Managers of the American Insti...
lead_paragraph: THE COMMON COUNCIL.--This Body held a special meeting on Tuesday evening, to take into consideration two pressing subjects. First, the Long Island Railroad case, and secondly, an invitation received from the Board of Managers of the American Institute, to visit their Annual Exhibition.

headline.main: BROOKLYN.; EARLY CLOSING OF STORES KINGS COUNTY BOARD OF SUPERVISORS. FATAL ACCIDENT. FUGITIVES FROM JUSTICE. HOTEL THIEF. THIEVES. ARRESTS.
